member.name: T:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.RemoteResponse
member.summary: Holds data for the response for connecting to the remote server for update.

member.name: P:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.RemoteResponse.InstallerPackageContent
member.summary: The Install Package. Save to a file and run to install the package.

member.name: P:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.RemoteResponse.ManifestFile
member.summary: The Update manifest file.

member.name: P:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.RemoteResponse.ResponseMessage
member.summary: The remote response from attempting to download either the UpdateManifest or installer package. Checking this will be useful for troubleshooting problems.

member.name: P:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.RemoteResponse.StatusCode
member.summary: The status code returned from either checking for an update or downloading the installer package.

member.name: P:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.RemoteResponse.RequestMessage
member.summary: The original http request for downloading the package installer or checking for update.

member.name: P:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.RemoteResponse.IsSuccess
member.summary: Flag that indicates that the check for update or the download of the installer package was successful.

member.name: T:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.UpdateChecker
member.summary: Class to check for and download and install an update to your application.

member.name: P:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.UpdateChecker.IsRequired
member.summary: Indicates whether or not the update is required.

member.name: P:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.UpdateChecker.LastRemoteResponse
member.summary: Last response from connection to the remote server for checking for update or downloading the installer package.

member.name: M:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.UpdateChecker.UpdateFromRemote(System.String)
member.summary: Downloads the remote installer package and executes it.
member.param: The direct http url link to the installer package.
member.returns: The error message if the process fails, or null if successful.

member.name: M:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.UpdateChecker.UpdateFromRemote
member.summary: Downloads the remote installer package and executes it.
member.returns: The error message if the process fails, or null if successful.

member.name: M:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.UpdateChecker.CheckRemote(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if an update is available.
member.param: Generally the entry assembly, or whatever assembly is used for version-checking.
The remote URL to the UpdateManifest file.
member.returns: True if there is an update available.

member.name: M:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.UpdateChecker.CheckRemote(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if an update is available.
member.param: Generally the entry assembly, or whatever assembly is used for version-checking.
The remote URL to the UpdateManifest file.
member.returns: True if there is an update available.

member.summary: Extension used for the Application version information file for automatic self-update.

member.summary: List of supported compression types, in addition to zip.

member.name: F:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.UpdateManifest.ZIPExtension
member.summary: The file extension for zip files.

member.name: M:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.UpdateManifest.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.param: The source of data for creating the Manifest file. This can be JSON data, or the path to a file with the JSON data, or it can be the path to the referenced AssemblyPath executable.
Required if the AssemblyPath executable is passed. Sets the URL to the application package installer.

member.name: P:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.UpdateManifest.Executable
member.summary: The assembly location for version checking.

member.summary: The Version for determining an update.

member.summary: The major version of an update.

member.summary: The minor version of an update.

member.summary: The revision of an update.

member.name: P:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.UpdateManifest.Build
member.summary: The build number of an update.

member.summary: The package filename, without the path.

member.summary: The size in bytes of the package file.

member.summary: Downloads the Remote Update Manifest file.
member.returns: The response from the remote, including the manifest if successful, or any error messages if failed.

member.name: M:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.UpdateManifest.GetManifestFile(System.String)
member.summary: Downloads the update manifest from the remote URL.
member.param: The local path to the UpdateManifest File

member.name: M:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.UpdateManifest.GetRemotePackage(System.String)
member.summary: Downloads the installer package from the remote URL.
member.param: The URL to the remote installer package.
member.returns: The response from the remote, including the installer package if successful, or any error messages if failed.

member.name: M:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.UpdateManifest.GetRemotePackage
member.summary: Downloads the remote installer package.
member.returns: The response from the remote, including the installer packkage if successful, or any error messages if failed.

member.name: M:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.UpdateManifest.NeedsUpdated(System.String)
member.summary: Tests the assembly against the latest version and determines if an update is needed.
member.param: The path to the assembly needing tested.
member.returns: True if the this version is higher than the passed local assembly version, otherwise false.

member.name: M:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.UpdateManifest.PackageIsValid(System.String)
member.summary: Validates that the checksum of the local file matches the expected checksum as provided by the remote Update Manifest file.
member.param: The local path to the downloaded installer package.
member.returns: True if the checksum is valid.

member.name: M:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.UpdateManifest.PackageIsValid(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Validates that the checksum of the local file matches the expected checksum as provided by the remote Update Manifest file.
member.returns: True if the checksum is valid.

member.name: M:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.UpdateManifest.GetFileChecksum(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the MD5 hash checksum for the provided file.
member.param: The full local path to the file to get the checksum for.
member.returns: The string representation of the MD5 checksum of the file.

member.name: M:RussJudge.AutoApplicationUpdater.UpdateManifest.GetFileChecksum(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Gets the MD5 hash checksum for the provided file.
member.param: The full binary data of the file.
member.returns: The string representation of the MD5 checksum of the file.
